title: How does Netflix's 'Play Something' work? - Quora

response.answer_text: The video streaming service Netflix is currently testing a new feature that'll help you, well, find some content to watch. Netflix is testing a new 'Shuffle Play' button, with which it hopes to help people watch something instead of just scrolling through the content and pass out. Some users seeing this new 'Shuffle Play' button on their account. It's not called Shuffle Play, though. Netflix is planning to call it the 'Play Something' button, which seems appropriate. Obviously, letting Netflix decide what to watch will not yield the best results but, at least, you won't blame yourself or your friends for recommending a bad show or a movie. It's on the algorithm. Hope this helps!!

Let’s begin! In general sense it works same as getting Youtube recommendations, Spotify weekly playlist and Instagram explore! In technical term it’s a ML model (AI) which collect data and predicts the next content you would like to see! By clicking like or follow you help the model to get better at predictions by which you will get better content as per your interest! Thus by which you will spend more time in the application and helps company to earn more money! That’s why today’s application are so addictive! They are designed in such a way that you invest most of your time on it! Hope it helps!
